name: Mouse AVI Setup Full Version
description:
Fixed Bugs!

Controls if you forgot again.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WASD For Boyfriend

go check out archiesonic's projects he updated my projects and also i thank him for making unhappy remastered test.

arrows for sad mouse avi

Press 2 for happy mouse

press 3 for the happy happy mouse

added flipping screen

press 7 to flip press 8 to reset the flip

if anything lagged just press 8 two times or multiple times. To Make it work

Added Startscene! from this project : https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/596813660/

-------------------------------------------------------------------------Scream is only for happy mouse(phase2) and very happy mouse(phase4)

Press F for a easter code verification

Thanks to @Bob-FNF For Phase 1

BF ( i dont really know.)

added healthbar

press K for next costume for healthbar

press L for previous costume for healthbar

press 9 for a old mickey mouse cutscene

added Girlfriend

press 7 to delete cursor

added icons!

added menuscreen!

added really happy mouse press 4

2.4 Pack : https://kxstudios.itch.io/mouse-avi-24-pack-for-free
